BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE hblt_dayend_dtl T SET T.hblnum_status=? WHERE gnum_hospital_code =? and T.hblnum_summ_no=?

UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET T.NUM_CASH_AMOUNT=(SELECT SUM(T.HBLNUM_RECD_AMT) FROM HBLT_DAYEND_PAYMENT_DTL T WHERE T.HBLNUM_SUMM_NO=T.STR_DS_NO AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND T.HBLNUM_PAYMENT_MODE=1), T.NUM_CR_CARD_AMT=(SELECT SUM(T.HBLNUM_RECD_AMT) FROM HBLT_DAYEND_PAYMENT_DTL T WHERE T.HBLNUM_SUMM_NO=T.STR_DS_NO AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND T.HBLNUM_PAYMENT_MODE=4), T.NUM_DR_CARD_AMT=(SELECT SUM(T.HBLNUM_RECD_AMT) FROM HBLT_DAYEND_PAYMENT_DTL T WHERE T.HBLNUM_SUMM_NO=T.STR_DS_NO AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND T.HBLNUM_PAYMENT_MODE=5) WHERE T.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?

INSERT INTO ACTFS_AL_DS_ACPT_TRN(INT_USER_TYPE,STR_NON_EMP_USER_NAME,STR_DS_NO,DT_DS_DATE,STR_COUNTER_NO,STR_SHIFT_NAME,STR_COUNTER_INCHARGE,NUM_AMOUNT_RECEIVED,NUM_AMOUNT_REFUNDED,NUM_NET_AMOUNT_RECEIVED,STR_NET_AMOUNT_IN_WORDS,STR_ACCEPTANCE_STATUS,STR_ACCEPTANCE_DATE,STR_ACCEPATNCE_REMAKRS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_CHALLAN_PREP_FLAG,STR_SHIFT_FROM,STR_SHIFT_TO,NUM_PACKAGE_COST,NUM_HOSPITAL_COST,STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_REQ,STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_REQ,STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_PREP,STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_PREP,STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_NO,STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_NO,STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_REQ,STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_PREP,NUM_OTHER_COST,STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_NO,NUM_CR_CARD_AMT, NUM_DR_CARD_AMT, NUM_CASH_AMOUNT, STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) (SELECT T.INT_USER_TYPE,T.STR_NON_EMP_USER_NAME,T.STR_DS_NO,T.DT_DS_DATE,T.STR_COUNTER_NO,T.STR_SHIFT_NAME,T.STR_COUNTER_INCHARGE,T.NUM_AMOUNT_RECEIVED,T.NUM_AMOUNT_REFUNDED,T.NUM_NET_AMOUNT_RECEIVED,T.STR_NET_AMOUNT_IN_WORDS,T.STR_ACCEPTANCE_STATUS,T.STR_ACCEPTANCE_DATE,T.STR_ACCEPATNCE_REMAKRS,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.NUM_CHALLAN_PREP_FLAG,T.STR_SHIFT_FROM,T.STR_SHIFT_TO,T.NUM_PACKAGE_COST,T.NUM_HOSPITAL_COST,T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_REQ,T.STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_REQ,T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_PREP,T.STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_PREP,T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_NO,T.STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_NO,T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_REQ,T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_PREP,T.NUM_OTHER_COST,T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_NO, T.NUM_CR_CARD_AMT, T.NUM_DR_CARD_AMT, T.NUM_CASH_AMOUNT,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTFS_AL_DS_ACPT_TRN A where A.STR_DS_NO=T.STR_DS_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T WHERE T.STR_DS_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)
UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET T.STR_ACCEPATNCE_REMAKRS=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_DS_NO=? and gnum_hospital_code =?
